languages.text: {n}Идира на мгновение застывает — а потом жалобно, почти по детски хнычет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... помогите..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира на мгновение застывает — а потом жалобно, почти по детски хнычет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... помогите..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира на мгновение застывает — а потом жалобно, почти по детски хнычет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... помогите..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉僵住了一会儿，随后以令人同情的、几乎是孩子般的声音恳求道。{/n}“舰长大人……救救我……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉僵住了一会儿，随后以令人同情的、几乎是孩子般的声音恳求道。{/n}“舰长大人……救救我……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira permanece quieta durante un momento, y después ruega con una voz lastimera, casi de niña:{/n} «Lord Capitán... Ayúdeme...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira permanece quieta durante un momento, y después ruega con una voz lastimera, casi de niña:{/n} «Lord Capitán... Ayúdeme...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは一瞬静止し、まるで子供のような哀れな声で懇願する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…助けて…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは一瞬静止し、まるで子供のような哀れな声で懇願する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…助けて…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira verstummt für einen Moment und fleht dann mit kläglicher, beinahe kindlicher Stimme: {/n}"Lord Captain ... Helft mir ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira verstummt für einen Moment und fleht dann mit kläglicher, beinahe kindlicher Stimme: {/n}"Lord Captain ... Helft mir ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence, Idira se met à vous implorer d'une petite voix penaude, presque enfantine.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Aidez-moi... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence, Idira se met à vous implorer d'une petite voix penaude, presque enfantine.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Aidez-moi... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, bir anlığına durup ardından sonra acıklı, neredeyse çocuksu bir ses tonuyla yalvarıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... Bana yardım et..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stills for a moment, and then she pleads in a piteous, almost childlike voice,{/n} "Lord Captain... Help me..."
